mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To Provide international markets with Mexican products of the highest quality through planning, coordination and professional logistic systems.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To Place the company as the number one in integral services in commerce thanks to the commitment and professionalism that allows us to create long-term links with our clients.

aboutUs.title: Who we are?
aboutUs.description: We are a company born from the pleasure of supporting Mexican farmers and artisans in the Placement, internationalization or commercialization of their products.

footer.title: Contact us
footer.description: If you have questions, criticism or suggestions, please contact us directly.

home.title: Corporativo Integral K&M del Bajío: Your Partner in International Business. | K&M
home.description: Welcome to Corporativo Integral K&M del Bajío, your Partner in International Business. We specialize in facilitating international trade with comprehensive services and customized solutions to optimize your global operations.

mission.title: Our Mission: Excellence in Mexican Products for Global Markets. | K&M
mission.description: Discover the mission of Corporativo Integral K&M del Bajío. Learn how we work to provide international markets with the highest quality Mexican products through planning, coordination and professional logistics systems.

vision.title: Our Vision: Leaders in Comprehensive Services in International Trade | K&M
vision.description: Discover the vision of Corporativo Integral K&M del Bajío. We strive to be leaders in comprehensive services in international trade, committed to professionalism and the creation of lasting links with our clients.

aboutUs.title: Who we are?: Committed to Excellence in International Trade | K&M
aboutUs.description: Learn more about us, Discover who we are at Corporativo Integral K&M del Bajío

services.title: Services: Commercial Linkage, Logistics and Trade Consulting | K&M
services.description: Discover our international services at Corporativo Integral K&M del Bajío. Specialized in commercial liaison, logistics services, international trade consulting, preventive audits and training in foreign trade.
